answers.answer: Dear Evangelina,i can't think of anything from diabetes that could bring on headaches except low blood sugars which she should check after exercise. i am not a medical person but a diabetic helping with my experience. The only other thing i can think of would be diabetes induced blood flow but that would most likely manifest during different times than just exercise. So she should try what her trainer recommends and if that doesn't  help a doctor may be needed to investigate.Good luck for your daughter, bret.

question: My daughter has started a training program for an olympic sport 2 weeks ago, 5 days a week ...she has been getting severe headaches during her weight training and hours after...the weights she lifts are considerable...she has been advised by her trainer that is probably releted to her posture, etc. while i want to be sure there are no additional variables to be concerned about since she is a diabetic.
title: weight training and severe headaches in 23 yr. old young woman
